name: Depth of Memory
description:
Dr. Brenner has disappeared under mysterious circumstances, leaving behind a strange device that can extract memories from objects. You're the detective that's trying to piece together what happened to him. Explore the Dr.'s lab and dig deeper and deeper into his memories to figure out what happened to him in this 3D puzzle/escape room game. Controls: Move with WASD or arrow keys and pick up objects with left mouse button. Use the 1,2, and 3 keys to make decisions, and press 0 to cancel a memory recovery.

Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 48! This was my first time participating in Ludum Dare, and I had a lot of fun (in between the nervous breakdowns)! Hope you guys like, be sure to leave comments letting me know what you think! :)
